pullrequest.title: Move FindODE.cmake to ign-cmake from ign-physics

content.raw:
We've made considerable changes to the original file, so I'd recommend changing this line to something like

`Originally written by there.exists.teslos<there.exists.teslos.gmail.com>`

and then we can follow that with a note that we modified the file, and then follow that with our copyright ([see FindDL.cmake for an example](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-cmake/src/0c53db445f47800bf24ace8a4bfd27d1e7a4c93e/cmake/FindDL.cmake?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default)).
content.html:
We've made considerable changes to the original file, so I'd recommend changing this line to something like

Originally written by there.exists.teslos<there.exists.teslos.gmail.com>

and then we can follow that with a note that we modified the file, and then follow that with our copyright (see FindDL.cmake for an example).
